name: Localist Calendar for WordPress
author: Localist Corporation

sections.description:
• Connect your self-hosted WordPress site to your Localist Calendar
  • Create event widgets on your WordPress site
  • Embed event widgets in posts, pages and themes

Finally, a calendar plugin that doesn’t reinvent the wheel. No more syncing between dozens of different calendar systems. If you’re a Localist customer, the Localist Calendar for WordPress plugin is all you need to share all the great events you’re hosting without any further customization.

Help visitors learn about all your events without having to leave WordPress! The Localist Calendar for WordPress plugin makes highlighting events on your WordPress site simple. In just a few clicks you can create an event widget that displays events from your Localist Calendar on any page on your site.

Other WordPress calendar plugins want your whole website to be a calendar, but with the Localist Calendar for WordPress plugin, you can seamlessly integrate event listings on a single page. It’s perfect for WordPress admins looking for a simple way to list upcoming events from their Localist Calendar.

Usage

How do I use the plugin?

After installing the Localist Calendar for WordPress plugin, you can begin setting up new widgets in the Localist Calendar section of your WordPress administration.

To begin, mouseover Localist Calendar in the navigation bar and click Add New Widget. Paste in your Localist Calendar’s URL and click Configure. Define your criteria, choose a name for the widget, then click Save as WordPress Widget. Once the widget is added, you can add it to a page, post, or theme in the appropriate areas of WordPress.

Copyright

All Localist Calendar for WordPress code is owned by Localist Corporation. Visit http://localist.com for more information.

Support

If you need additional help, you can speak to a Localist expert via support@localist.com. Or by visiting our knowledge base at http://support.localist.com.

<?php code(); // goes in backticks ?>
sections.installation: Install the Localist Calendar for WordPress plugin via the WordPress plugin directory, or by uploading the files manually to your server. After becoming a Localist customer, use the plugin to connect to your calendar and enable event listing features.

short_description: The most powerful way to highlight events on your WordPress website.
